fields.Example: You are to provide an example sentence in Japanese for the word {{expression}}. Use only simple (N5) vocab and grammar.  Respond only with the Japanese example sentence followed by the english translation in paranthesis, nothing else.
fields.Mmemonic: You are to provide a mnemonic for the word {{expression}}. A mnemonic is a memory aid that helps you remember information. Respond only with the mnemonic, nothing else.
